featured.text: Dr. Chu’s speech on the new energy source attracted great _____ from the audience at the conference.

definition.zh_def: 一種用於表示動作或狀態的詞，通常指向某個方向或位置。
definition.en_def: A word used to indicate an action or state, often pointing to a direction or location.
definition.example: He decided to chu towards the exit.
